Question
========

In 6 patients with adult-onset diabetes, the weight (in kg) was determined with results: 84, 78, 65, 103, 91, 87. When the weight in pounds is presented (1 kg = 2 pounds), the standard deviation will be

Answerlist
----------

* Become twice as large
* Remain the same
* Become twice as small
* Become four times smaller

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Become twice as large: Correct
* Remain the same: Incorrect
* Become twice as small: Incorrect
* Become four times smaller: Incorrect
